text: This is a list of the heads of state of Nigeria, from independence in 1960 to the present day. The President of Nigeria is the current head of state and government. ==Monarchy (1960–1963)== ===Monarch=== Queen Queen Queen Reign Reign Reign Royal House Prime Minister Portrait Name Start End
